cue cmd test

-- blah/blah.cue --
package blah

#Pod: {
 spec?: #PodSpec
}

#PodSpec: {
}
-- cue.mod/module.cue --
module: "mod.com"
-- x_tool.cue --
package kube

import (
 "tool/cli"
 "mod.com/blah"
)

root: blah.#Pod

root: spec: _

command: test: task: test: cli.Print & {
 for _ in root {
  text: "success"
 }
}
-- y_tool.cue --
package kube
